rules_text: When Corpus Cobbler enters, create a Junk token for each spell you've cast this turn. [i](They're artifacts with “{T}, Sacrifice this: Exile the top card of your library. You may play that card this turn. Activate only as a sorcery.”)[/i]
flavor_text: [i]“The crash really got you in a sorry state, didn't it? Let's get you home and cleaned up.”[/i]
